commands.statement:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Aggregate" ( -- 입력일자 "CreateDate" INTEGER NOT NULL,
-- 입력시간 "CreateHour" INTEGER NOT NULL,
-- 프로젝트 ID "ProjectID" TEXT NOT NULL,
-- 거래 ID "TransactionID" TEXT NOT NULL,
-- 기능 ID "FeatureID" TEXT NOT NULL,
-- 요청수 "RequestCount" INTEGER NULL,
-- 응답수 "ResponseCount" INTEGER NULL,
-- 오류수 "ErrorCount" INTEGER NULL,
-- 최근요청일시 "LatelyRequestAt" TEXT NULL,
-- 최근응답일시 "LatelyResponseAt" TEXT NULL,
-- 최근응답구분 "Acknowledge" TEXT NULL, CONSTRAINT "PK_Aggregate" PRIMARY KEY ("CreateDate", "CreateHour", "ProjectID", "TransactionID", "FeatureID") );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "ErrorDetail" ( -- 에러상세 NO "ErrorDetailNo" INTEGER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT "PK_ErrorDetail" PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
-- 프로젝트 ID "ProjectID" TEXT NULL,
-- 거래 ID "TransactionID" TEXT NULL,
-- 기능 ID "FeatureID" TEXT NULL,
-- 거래 글로벌 ID "GlobalID" TEXT NULL,
-- 사용자 ID "UserID" TEXT NULL,
-- 로그 구분 "TAGType" TEXT NULL,
-- 입력일시 "CreatedAt" TEXT NULL );

statement.desc: 당일 및 금주 거래 요청/응답/오류 집계 조회

commands.statement: SELECT 'TODAY' AS DateType , IFNULL(SUM(AG.RequestCount), 0) AS RequestCount , IFNULL(SUM(AG.ResponseCount), 0) AS ResponseCount , IFNULL(SUM(AG.ErrorCount), 0) AS ErrorCount FROM Aggregate AG WHERE AG.CreateDate = @RequestDate UNION SELECT 'WEEK' AS DateType , IFNULL(SUM(AG.RequestCount), 0) AS RequestCount , IFNULL(SUM(AG.ResponseCount), 0) AS ResponseCount , IFNULL(SUM(AG.ErrorCount), 0) AS ErrorCount FROM Aggregate AG WHERE AG.CreateDate BETWEEN @FirstDateOfWeek AND @LastDateOfWeek;

statement.desc: 최근 7일 일시별 요청수, 오류수 합계 조회

commands.statement: SELECT AG.ProjectID , AG.TransactionID , AG.FeatureID , AG.RequestCount , AG.ResponseCount , AG.ErrorCount , strftime('%H:%M:%S', AG.LatelyRequestAt) || ' / ' || strftime('%H:%M:%S', AG.LatelyResponseAt) AS RequestResponseTime , strftime('%s', AG.LatelyResponseAt) - strftime('%s', AG.LatelyRequestAt) AS DurationSecond FROM Aggregate AG WHERE AG.CreateDate = @CreateDate AND AG.CreateHour = @CreateHour ORDER BY 7 DESC;

SELECT ED.ProjectID , ED.TransactionID , ED.FeatureID , ED.GlobalID , ED.UserID , ED.TAGType , strftime('%H:%M:%S', ED.CreatedAt) AS CreatedAt FROM ErrorDetail ED WHERE strftime('%Y%m%d-%H', ED.CreatedAt) = (@CreateDate || '-' || @CreateHour) ORDER BY 7 DESC;

statement.desc: 거래 요청/응답/오류 집계 정보 입력 또는 변경

commands.statement: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO Aggregate ( CreateDate , CreateHour , ProjectID , TransactionID , FeatureID , RequestCount , ResponseCount , ErrorCount , LatelyRequestAt , LatelyResponseAt , Acknowledge ) VALUES ( @CreateDate , @CreateHour , @ProjectID , @TransactionID , @FeatureID , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RequestCount), 0) + 1 FROM Aggregate S WHERE S.CreateDate = @CreateDate AND S.CreateHour = @CreateHour AND S.ProjectID = @ProjectID AND S.TransactionID = @TransactionID AND S.FeatureID = @FeatureID) , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ResponseCount), 0) FROM Aggregate S WHERE S.CreateDate = @CreateDate AND S.CreateHour = @CreateHour AND S.ProjectID = @ProjectID AND S.TransactionID = @TransactionID AND S.FeatureID = @FeatureID) , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ErrorCount), 0) FROM Aggregate S WHERE S.CreateDate = @CreateDate AND S.CreateHour = @CreateHour AND S.ProjectID = @ProjectID AND S.TransactionID = @TransactionID AND S.FeatureID = @FeatureID) , @LatelyRequestAt , @LatelyResponseAt , @Acknowledge );

UPDATE Aggregate SET ResponseCount = (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ResponseCount), 0) + 1 FROM Aggregate S WHERE S.CreateDate = @CreateDate AND S.CreateHour = @CreateHour AND S.ProjectID = @ProjectID AND S.TransactionID = @TransactionID AND S.FeatureID = @FeatureID) , LatelyResponseAt = @LatelyResponseAt , Acknowledge = @Acknowledge WHERE CreateDate = @CreateDate AND CreateHour = @CreateHour AND ProjectID = @ProjectID AND TransactionID = @TransactionID AND FeatureID = @FeatureID;

UPDATE Aggregate SET ErrorCount = (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ErrorCount), 0) + 1 FROM Aggregate S WHERE S.CreateDate = @CreateDate AND S.CreateHour = @CreateHour AND S.ProjectID = @ProjectID AND S.TransactionID = @TransactionID AND S.FeatureID = @FeatureID) , LatelyResponseAt = @LatelyResponseAt , Acknowledge = @Acknowledge WHERE CreateDate = @CreateDate AND CreateHour = @CreateHour AND ProjectID = @ProjectID AND TransactionID = @TransactionID AND FeatureID = @FeatureID;

INSERT INTO ErrorDetail ( ProjectID , TransactionID , FeatureID , GlobalID , UserID , TAGType , CreatedAt ) VALUES ( @ProjectID , @TransactionID , @FeatureID , @GlobalID , @UserID , @TAGType , @CreatedAt );
